information_research_and_summarization.task_description: Find the current weather in my city and write a short note about it in Notes.
Search for the top 3 trending news topics on X and write a short summary in Notes.
Find the most popular tourist attractions in Paris on TripAdvisor and create a summary in Notes.
Research the latest smartphone reviews on Google and YouTube, then summarize the findings in Notes.
Find recent scientific papers on AI from arxiv and summarize the main findings alongside related news from X in Notes.

routine_management.task_description: Set a daily reminder at 8 AM in the Calendar to check emails.
Sort emails in Gmail into folders labeled 'Work', 'Personal', and 'Others'.
Review my Calendar for the week and suggest optimal time slots for a 1-hour workout.
Check my Gmail for important messages and draft automatic replies for them.
Consolidate meeting schedules from Gmail and create a comprehensive weekly plan in Notes.

online_shopping_and_deal_hunting.task_description: Search for a Bluetooth speaker under $50 on Amazon.
Compare the prices of the same speaker on Walmart, Best Buy, and Amazon Shopping.
Find a flight deal to New York City for next weekend using TripAdvisor and Booking.
Check for discounts on groceries across Walmart and Amazon, and compile the best deals in Notes.
Research Black Friday deals for gaming consoles on Best Buy, Walmart, and Amazon Shopping, then rank the deals by value in Notes.

entertainment_and_recreation.task_description: Search for viral TikTok challenges and save the most interesting one in Notes.
Find the top 3 music playlists on YouTube for relaxing and save the links in Notes.
Check the best-rated local parks on TripAdvisor and suggest a good time to visit based on weather.
Plan a weekend getaway using Booking for accommodations and Maps for travel time.
Create a 3-day travel itinerary to Los Angeles with suggested attractions from REDnote and local restaurant recommendations from Maps.
